refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: An Index contains the formatted index of a document. An index may begin with introductory material, followed by any number of IndexEntrys or IndexDivs.

refsection.title: Processing expectations
refsection.para: An Index in a Book frequently causes a forced page break in print media.
In many processing systems, indexes are generated automatically or semiautomatically and never appear instantiated as DocBook markup.
